tool_description: The fastest way to access data, such as price, sale rank, and reviews, for any item on Amazon.
title: Amazon Web Scraper

api_list.name: Get Amazon Product Details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-web-scraper1.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-web-scraper1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
